statements: SELECT * FROM customer_order_history WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM customer_order_history WHERE order_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM customer_order_history WHERE product_id = 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_order_history WHERE quantity > 5 AND product_id = 7;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_order_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM customer_order_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_order_history WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id, order_date;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_order_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM customer_order_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, quantity FROM customer_order_history WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC

SELECT c.customer_id, c.order_id, c.order_date, p.product_name, p.unit_price FROM CustomerOrders c JOIN ProductInventory p ON c.order_id = p.product_id WHERE p.stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY c.order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM CustomerOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(total_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, address, city, country FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, country FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Customers JOIN CustomerOrders ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerOrders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerOrders ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerOrders.customer_id JOIN Products ON CustomerOrders.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY customer_name, product_name;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM Customers JOIN CustomerOrders ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerOrders.customer_id JOIN Products ON CustomerOrders.product_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM Customer c JOIN Order o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product WHERE unit_price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer c JOIN Order o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecasted_amount FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details WHERE quantity >= 5;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_amount FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date ASC, forecasted_amount DESC;
